The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Watermark
Inscribed: [Le Jour de Terme (p. seche)/ (inèdite)]; verso: [First state,- here called by Buhot \"Le Jour du Terme\" (the day when the lease expires and the poor wretch has to turn out, carrying his belongings with him] [After changing the plate considerably Buhot published it with the title \"Le Peintre du Marine\"]
title: The Seascape Painter
